oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-02-23 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 23, 1957. Featuring Ott Devine (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer - although Jim Reeves was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performer Johnny Horton, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Vaden, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ferlin Husky; Rod Brasfield; Johnny Horton; Tommy Vaden; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ott Devine introduces Ferlin Husky -- I Feel Better All Over (Ferlin Husky) -- Opening statement (Ott Devine, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ferlin Husky) -- Be Kind To Your Web-Footed Friends (Rod Brasfield) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Johnny Horton -- I'm A One Woman Man (Johnny Horton) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Tommy Vaden -- Mississippi Sawyer (Tommy Vaden fiddle) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Saith The Lord (Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Chet Atkins -- Avalon (Chet Atkins) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Vaden, Tommy; Horton, Johnny; Husky, Ferlin
